name: Check if user able to add a record with valid endpoint and request body with missing value
description: Given: User creates POST Request for the LMS API endpoint

steps.name: When  User sends HTTPS Request and  request Body with missing mandatory and additional  fields for an id from the excel sheet "Assignment" and 0
Then  User receives 400 Bad Request Status with message and boolean success details with invalid Assignment Request
